name: HashKey Group
fullText:
🌟 Delighted to welcome Raymond Qu @raymondqu, Founder of Geoswift @GeoswiftLimited and Co-founder of PolyFlow @Polyflow_PayFi.

Raymond aims to transform the global payment landscape & create efficient, innovative pay solutions. He is currently an appointed senior adviser to https://t.co/Vylknfhyl3

name: HashKey Group
fullText:

Bob is the Founder of Questflow, where he applies his extensive experience in building AI-native platforms and scaling ventures from inception. A UC https://t.co/XycwIXYgdR

name: Cos(余弦)😶‍🌫️
fullText:
项目方智能合约的 Owner 一定要多签，掌握钥匙之人一定要只用支持复杂签名解析且大屏幕的硬件钱包…从助记词生成到使用全在硬件钱包里，加个 Passphrase 或备份用 SSS(Shamir's secret sharing)，备份起来更放心…

然后就是平时使用时冷静些，别瞎签名，并做好灾备演练，不小心演练一定会出现意外…
